Translations.Text: (napiye!) Umatu ullattai nam umakku virivakkavillaiya
umatu cumaiyaiyum um'maivittum nam irakkivittom
atu, umatu ituppaiye murittuk kontiruntatu
umatu kirttiyaiyum nam uyarttinom
niccayamaka ciramattutan caukariyam irukkiratu
meyyakave ciramattutan caukariyam irukkiratu
akave, (markkap piraccarattiliruntu) nir vitupattatum, (iraivanai vanankuvatarku) cirattai etuppiraka
melum, (tunpattilum inpattilum) umatu iraivanaiye nir nokki nirpiraka
attiyin mitum,jeytunin mitum cattiyamaka
sinay malaiyin mitum cattiyamaka
apayamalikkum innakarattin mitum cattiyamaka
niccayamaka nam manitanai mikka alakana amaippil pataittirukkirom
(avanutaiya tiya natattaiyin karanamakap) pinnar, avanait talntavarkalilum talntavanaka nam akki vitukirom
ayinum, evarkal nampikkaikontu narceyalkalaic ceytu varukirarkalo avarkalait tavira. (Avarkal melana tanmaiyil iruppatutan) avarkalukku (enrenrume) tataipatata (nar)kuliyuntu
kuli kotukkum nalaip parri (napiye!) Itarkup pinnar, um'mai evartan poyyakka mutiyum
tirppalippavarkalil ellam, allah mika melana nitipatiyallava
(napiye! Anaittaiyum) pataitta umatu iraivanin peyaral (avanatu kattalaikal atankiya tiru kur'anai) otuviraka
avane manitanai irattakkattiyiliruntu pataikkiran
(napiye! Melum) nir otuviraka! Umatu iraivan maperum kotaiyali
Avantan elutukolaik kontu (elutak) karruk kotuttan
(atan mulam) manitan ariyatavarrai ellam avanukkuk karruk kotukkiran
(ivvariruntum,) manitan (avanukku nanri celuttuvatarkup patilakat) tannai (iraivanin aruliliruntu) tevaiyarravan enru meyyakave ennikkontu, avanukku maru ceykiran
(ivvariruntum,) manitan (avanukku nanri celuttuvatarkup patilakat) tannai (iraivanin aruliliruntu) tevaiyarravan enru meyyakave ennikkontu, avanukku maru ceykiran
niccayamaka umatu iraivan pakkamtan (avan) mila ventum
(napiye!) Or atiyar tolutal, atait tatai ceykinravanai nir (kavanittup) parttira
(napiye!) Or atiyar tolutal, atait tatai ceykinravanai nir (kavanittup) parttira
avar nerana pataiyil iruntukontu, iraiyaccattai evikkontiruntum (avarai avan tatai ceyvatai) nir (kavanittup) parttira
avar nerana pataiyil iruntukontu, iraiyaccattai evikkontiruntum (avarai avan tatai ceyvatai) nir (kavanittup) parttira
(avan, avaraip) poyyakkip purakkanippataiyum nir kavanittira
(avan ceyyum inta tusta kariyankalai) niccayamaka allah parkkiran enpatai avan arintu kollavillaiya
(ivvaru avan ceyvatu) takatu; (inta tusta ceyaliliruntu) avan vilakik kollavitil, kurram ceyyum appoyyanin mun kutumiyaip pitittu nam iluppom
(ivvaru avan ceyvatu) takatu; (inta tusta ceyaliliruntu) avan vilakik kollavitil, kurram ceyyum appoyyanin mun kutumiyaip pitittu nam iluppom
akave, avan (tan utavikkakat) tan capaiyorai alaikkattum
Namum (avanai narakattirku anuppa, narakattin) kavalalikalai alaippom
(napiye!) Niccayamaka nir avanukkuk kilppatiyatir. (Umatu iraivanukkuc) ciram panintu vananki (avanai) nerunkuviraka
niccayamaka nam inta kur'anai (mikka kanniyamulla) lailatul katr ennum or iravil (mutalavataka) irakkivaittom
(napiye!) Antak kanniyamulla iravin makimaiyai nir arivira
kanniyamulla anta iravu ayiram matankalai vita mikka melanatakum
atil vanavarkalum, jiprayilum, tankal iraivanin kattalaiyin pati (nataipera ventiya) ella kariyankalutan irankukinranar
‘‘salam'' (iterram) untakuka! (Avviravin iccirappu) vitiyarkalai utayamakum varai (nitikkiratu)

itai nirakarikkum vetattaiyutaiyavarkalilum, inaivaittu vanankupavarkalilum palar, tankalitam telivana attatci varum varai (oru telivana attatci vantal, ataip pinparra ventum enra nallennattil iruntu) vilakatu (urutiyakave) iruntanar
(avarkalitam vantirukkum telivana attatci ennavenral, avarkalukkup) paricuttamana vetankalai otik kanpikkakkutiya allahvinutaiya (intat) tutartan
(avar otik kanpikkum) atil nilaiyana catta tittankale varaiyappattirukkinrana

(avarkalin varavai etirparttu, avarkalaip pinparruvatakak kurik kontirunta) vetattai utaiyavarkal tankalitam telivana attatci(yakiya nam tutar) vantatan pinnar (avarukku) maruceytu pilavupattu vittanar

(Eninum, avarkal) iraivanutaiya kalapparra markkattaiye pinparri, marra markkankalaip purakkanittu, allah oruvanaiye vananki, tolukaiyaiyum kataippitittu, jakattum kotuttu varumare tavira, (veretuvum ittutar mulam) avarkalukku evappatavillai. (Itu, avarkalutaiya vetattilum evappatta visayamtan.) Itutan nilaiyana cattankalutaiya markkam

akave, vetattaiyutaiyavarkalilum, inaivaittu vanankupavarkalilum, (inta napiyin varavai etirparttiruntavarkalil) evarkal (avarai) nirakarikkirarkalo avarkal niccayamaka naraka neruppil tan irupparkal. Atil, avarkal enrenrume tankivituvarkal. Ivarkaltan pataippukalil maka kettavarkal
ayinum, (inta napiyin varavai etirparttiruntavarkalil) evarkal(avarai) nampikkai kontu narceyalkal ceykirarkalo avarkale, niccayamaka pataippukalil mikac cirantavarkal

avarkalutaiya kuli avarkalin iraivanitattil ulla ‘atn' ennum nilaiyana corkkankalakum. Avarril niraruvikal totarntu otikkonteyirukkum. Enrenrume avarkal atil nirantaramaka tankivituvarkal. Allahvum avarkalaip parri tiruptiyataivan. Avarkalum allahvaip parri tirupti ataivarkal. Evar tan iraivanukkup payappatukiraro, avarukkuttan inta pakkiyam kitaikkum
(pukampattal) pumi palamaka acaikkappatumpotu
atu, tan cumantiruppavarrai (ellam veliyil) erintuvitum camayattil
manitan (titukkittu) ‘itarkenna nerntatu' (en ivvaru acaikkappattatu?) Enru ketpan
annalil atu, tanakkut terintavarrai ellam arivittu vitum
(ivvare) umatu iraivan vahyi mulam (tanakku) kattalaiyittirukkiran enru kurum
Annalil manitarkal, (nanmaiyo timaiyo) tankal ceyta ceyalkalaik kanpatarkaka(p pala pirivukalakap pirintu) kuttam kuttamaka (vicaranaikkaka) varuvarkal
akave, evar or anuvalavu nanmai ceytiruntaro avar, (anku) ataiyum kantukolvar
(avvare) evan or anuvalavu timai ceytiruntano, ataiyum avan (anku) kantu kolvan
muccut tinara ativekamakac cellum kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka
(avai cellum vekattil kulampukaliliruntu) neruppaik kakkum
innum avai atikalaiyil (etirikal mitum) payntu cellum
(avvaru vekamakac cellumpotu, mekattaippol) pulutiyaik kilappum
pinnar, (etirikalin pataiyin) mattiyil nulaintuvitum
(ittakaiya kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka!) Niccayamaka manitan tan iraivanukku nanrikettavan avan
niccayamaka avane itarkuc catciyavan
niccayamaka avan porulkalai mikka katinamakave necikkiran
